brainly_data.question:
What is a tariff?
A. tax on a business to increase revenue 
B. tax on imports to protect local and national business 
C. tax on exports from local businesses to make money 
D. payment for purchase of means to produce goods
brainly_data.subject: Business

all_answers.question:
What is a tariff?
A. tax on a business to increase revenue 
B. tax on imports to protect local and national business 
C. tax on exports from local businesses to make money 
D. payment for purchase of means to produce goods
all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text: A tariff is a tax on imports from other countries.
